DOC.brief_summary: Multidrug resistance bacteria infection is common in ICU. Infection incidence is associated with age, organ dysfunction, invasive treatment and enviroment cleaning. According to hospital hygienic standard for disinfection, total numbers of colony of air and the object surface in ICU must be ≤4CFU/cm2（5min）and≤10CFU/cm2. in this study, the two different methods will be used to evaluate the disinfection effects in ICU enviroments.
DOC.brief_title: Comparision of Different Methods of Enviromennt Disinfection
DOC.criteria: no patients recruitment no patients recruitment
